talents.name: TeamVolley
talents.label: Team Volley
talents.description: When merging, all Boreas units enter the second phase. The interval for triggering other phases remains unchanged.

talents.name: SecondBreath
talents.label: Second Breath
talents.description: There's a 35% chance that the transition to the second phase gets reactivated.

talents.name: SleepArrows
talents.label: Sleep Arrows
talents.description: During the second phase activation, there's a 20% chance to fire two arrows. These arrows slow enemy attack by 25% for 10s in PvP or increase attack speed in Co-Op.

talents.name: ShowerOfArrows
talents.label: Shower of Arrows
talents.description: On second phase activation, there's a 30% chance to release a shower of arrows dealing 200 damage. The damage is based on the unit's merge rank and is always critical.
